Translations.Text: His popol respond per dir Evict them your town! Ili est popol who wish est pur
Consequently ni sav him his famili ne his wife; sxi est kun des doomed
Ni dusx them nepr dusx; not consequences kulp

Al Midyan ni send their frat Shu aib. Li dir O my popol worship DI; vi ne hav ali di Him. Proof ven vi your Lord Vi don plen weight plen mezur when vi meti. Ne cheat popol their dekstr! Ne corrupt ter gxi set rekt! This est put vi se vi est believers
Refrain blok cxiu path streb repel those kred path DI ne far gxi crooked Memor vi uz est few Li multiplied your numer! Recall consequences por des wicked
Tuj kelk da vi hav kred en ki mi send kelk disbelieved wait DI issues His judgment us; Li est bon jugx
